sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react';
import { Form, FormGroup, Input, Label, Button } from 'reactstrap';

export default class App extends Component {
  constructor() {
    super()
    this.state = {
      name: '',
      email: '',
      message: ''
    }
    this.handleChange = this.handleChange.bind(this)
  }
  handleChange = e => {
    this.setState({ [e.target.name]: e.target.value })
  }
  render() {
    return(
      <Form style={{ width: '600px' }}>

        <FormGroup style={{ padding: '20px' }}>
          <Label for="name">
            Name:
          </Label>
          <Input
            type="text"
            name="name"
            onChange={this.handleChange}
          />
        </FormGroup>

        <FormGroup style={{ padding: '20px' }}>
          <Label for="email">
            Email:
          </Label>
          <Input
            type="email"
            name="email"
            onChange={this.handleChange}
          />
        </FormGroup>

        <FormGroup style={{ padding: '20px' }}>
          <Label for="message">
            Message:
          </Label>
          <Input
            type="textarea"
            name="message"
            onChange={this.handleChange}
          />
        </FormGroup>

        <FormGroup style={{ padding: '20px' }}>
          <Button>
            Submit
          </Button>
        </FormGroup>
        
      </Form>
    )
  }
}
